action.action-desc: Mr. Joyce of Pennsylvania (for himself, Mr. Sarbanes, Mr. Gimenez, and Ms. Underwood) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title V of the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize certain mental health programs for children, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Continuing Systems of Care for Children Act .

section.header: Comprehensive Community Mental Health Services for Children with Serious Emotional Disturbances
section.text: Section 565(f)(1) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 290ff–4(f)(4)) is amended by striking $119,026,000 for each of fiscal years 2018 through 2022 and inserting $125,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2023 through 2027.

section.header: Substance Use Disorder Treatment and Early Intervention Services for Children and Adolescents
section.text: Section 514 of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 290bb–7) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by striking Indian tribes or tribal organizations and inserting Indian Tribes or Tribal organizations; and
in subsection (f), by striking 2018 through 2022 and inserting 2023 through 2027.
